Instance.description: Tuning for a QuestGig. Like Missions, these Gigs have no deadline, and use dynamically chosen Objectives. However, objectives/tasks may be hidden from the player until activated.

Tunable.name: hide_inactive_objectives
Tunable.description: If checked, any inactive objectives (including already-completed objectives and objectives that require the previous one to be complete) will not appear in the UI until activated.

Tunable.name: picker_description_text
Tunable.description: The concatenated text that will be used to be displayed as the Quest Gig description text in the Quest Picker. Combines the customer description text and the rewards text. Ex: {0.String} {1.String}

TunableVariant.name: quest_rel_text
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows rel reward text to be displayed for the QuestGig in the Career Panel. The rel gain is with the Quest target sim. Ex: +Rel with {0.Name}

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The rel reward text to be displayed in the QuestGig summary in the Career Panel.
